sentences.sContent: This last point was understood to be an allusion to the long-standing hostility between the two leaders.
sentences.sCn: 这最后一点曾被理解为对这两位领导人之间长久敌意的一种影射。

remMethod.val: 来自allude (v. 间接提到， 暗指)

words.tran: 暗指，转弯抹角地说到；略为提及，顺便提到

trans.tranCn: 典故， 引用典故； 暗示
trans.tranOther: something said or written that mentions a subject, person etc indirectly
